title: Why Are Seattle Drivers Paying So Much More for Gas?
summary: Gas prices are falling across much of the United States, but Seattle drivers are still paying a premium, according to Fox 13 Seattle. The national average for a gallon of gas is $3.066. In Washington state, the average jumps to $4.388 per gallon. In the Seattle–Bellevue–Everett metro area, the pric…

title: SM Energy, Civitas Resources Announce $12.8 Billion Merger
summary: SM Energy and Civitas Resources announced an all-stock merger valued at about $2.8 billion in equity, or $12.8 billion including debt, creating one of the largest independent U.S. shale producers by output and acreage. Bloomberg reported that under the agreement, Civitas shareholders will receive 1…

summary: SM Energy and Civitas Resources announce all-stock ‘strategic combination’

title: Opec+ to pause oil output rises next year after warnings of glut
summary: Crude prices climb after eight countries agree to pause further production increases at start of 2026

title: Gold rally puts shine on cyanide producers
